questions.question: Trump announced that he and Melania Trump tested + for COVID, who so far hasn't tested positive?

choices.answer: Chris Christie, former governor of New Jersey
Kayleigh McEnany, White House press secretary
Senator Thom Tillis of North Carolina

imageMetadata.altText: Trump Holds Joint Press Conf. With King Abdullah II Of Jordan At White House

questions.question: At least 11 people who attended a  ______ in the White House Rose Garden on Sept. 26 have since tested + for COVID.

choices.answer: memorial service for Justice Ruth Bader Ginsburg
nomination ceremony for Judge Amy Coney Barrett

questions.question: The first presidential debate between Pres. Trump and Joseph Biden Jr. on Sept. 29 ________

choices.answer: began with a handshake despite the pandemic
was marred by frequent jeers from the audience

questions.question: The coronavirus pandemic reached a sobering milestone last week: one million deaths worldwide. Has passed which disease?

questions.question: On Oct. 1, New York became the first big city in the United States to ________.

choices.answer: close all systems of public transportation
eradicate all new cases of coronavirus
reopen all of its public schools
test all of its residents for antibodies

questions.question: One is from the satirical site The Onion. Which is the fake news story?

choices.answer: “Can Halloween Be Saved? Yes, Experts Say. Here’s How.”
“Amid a Fashion Month Like No Other, Scenes of a Not-So-Distant Past”
“Festive Corn Maze Misread by Aliens as Declaration of Intergalactic War”
“Leaf Peeping Is Not Canceled: 6 Drives and Hikes to Try This Fall”
